snippet: As more research finds health hazards in sitting for prolonged periods, more manufacturers are offering desks that let workers stand, or even walk, while toiling at the keyboard.
abstract: Steve Lohr Unboxed column points out that more research is finding health hazards in sitting for prolonged periods, and more manufacturers are offering desks that let workers stand, or even walk, while toiling at the keyboard.
lead_paragraph: As more research finds health hazards in sitting for prolonged periods, more manufacturers are offering desks that let workers stand, or even walk, while toiling at the keyboard.
